Articles.Content:
Haha... Right.

- - - Updated - - -

Computer, call *Discovery*

- - - Updated - - -

Fire Kinemetic warheads at my coordinates.

- - - Updated - - -

Goodbye, Sampa

**Nuax approaches Laythe**

Don't fight it. You will only make things harder...

Compress space around the impact point, and alter their trajectories.

> 
> Sampa... Your mind is degrading. Surrender to us, and you can live with Nuax...

I will NEVER join you. My duty is to my people, the people of this galaxy. You may yet destroy us. Your weapons and armor is powerful, and i may fall, but if one hero falls, there will always be another to take his or her place. And i will fight you to my last breath.
I stand for free will. Or sit. Whatever. But the point is, no thanks, maybe later-ahem, never.
You are surrounded. What fight could you possibly wage?

Operation Sentience is ready.

(Enters Multiverse, taking Sampa and Xannari with me)

- - - Updated - - -

Try to fight me here, where I am omnipotent

I will never surrender...

Hey, i gtg. Cya
[Omnipotence has no real meaning. It's a paradox]

But still...

- - - Updated - - -

The multiverse cures you

[At least try to make sense. You're gonna have to explain a few things.

1. How can we enter the physical form of a concept, and one that has no physical form?

2. Why does this "multiverse" equate to omnipotent?

3. If you, why no one else?]

Because I went through the Great Attractor, and the Kinemet reacted with me.

I'm special

[And if you "went through the Great Attractor":

1. How did you avoid getting torn apart?

2. What is the other side of a place which goes nowhere?

3. How are you moving so fast?

Kinemet:

1. If it can react with other elements, it is likely not nearly as strong as you boast. Care to describe it's stoichiometry?

2. If it's maximum known durability is only 27 Petanewtons, how can it possibly survive over any magnitude of Yottanewtons, or even Brontonewtons?

3. Is it made of organic material?

Special:

1. Why?

2. How?

3. When?]

Because

- - - Updated - - -

I could only test it at 27 petanewtons because I didn't have a collider big enough. It only reacts in extremely high energy envoriornments. (Remember when the Citadel blew up? That was because I ignited the Kinemet in the structure with a device)

- - - Updated - - -

Because.

If we're going to be realistic, first of all, the Great Attractor is *not* Ã¢â‚¬â€¹inside the Milky Way.
Uhhh... Just FYI, I'm gone for a week in Real Life. Vacation. You know. I'm not abandoning the thread. Just for a week.
Nooooo! Not real life!
I know. it sucks

You were killed by Real Life using Vacation

(I play WAY too much minecraft)

- - - Updated - - -

Is anyone on?

> 
> You were killed by Real Life using Vacation
> (I play WAY too much minecraft)
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Is anyone on?

(Just got back on, had to sleep)
Yay Sampa's back!

Laythe, put just myself back onto my ship and keep...this thing occupied...i need time to synthesise a cure. When i give the signal, put her back on the ship, i'll try to get her to chase me...i'll figure everything out from there...

I locked her on our ship

- - - Updated - - -

Hopefully she doesn't hack the controls and-- [Click] (vessel unlocks) NOO!
Let me guess, it w as s a room with a computer in it?
She was on the ship. Our ship

Well, hopefully, this will give me time to get a cure made

\*Works feverishly for one hour\*

I got it!

Takes a syringe and uses it on himself before taking out another one\*

This might sting a little, laythe.

What? I don't need it!

- - - Updated - - -

No... No.... Stop!!

- - - Updated - - -

What.. No..... No... Get away from me! 

(Eyes briefly turn red, then resume normal color)
